section.heading: Fair market provision.
section.text: The provisions of § 31-3303.07(j) shall apply to health insurance coverage offered by a health insurer in the individual market in the same manner as they apply to health insurance coverage offered by a health insurer in connection with a group health plan in the small or large group market.
